name: One Way IT Solutions
description:
One Way IT Solutions are the software/mobile designing and development company which specialises in CRM, Workflow, Inventory, B2B, B2C, MLM, ERP, Accounting and other Software Development. We have our offices in UK and India. We specialise in Designing (UI/UX) and Development of web-based portals.
We have more than 15 years of experience in software designing, development and consulting. Since 2001 we have successfully operated in the development of software systems on individual customers requirements to accompany your various fields of activity: Accounting, e-commerce, science, education, medicine, etc.
Feel free to come back to us if you need help developing something similar. We can even help give consulting on how to best develop this and which technology to use etc.
We provide high quality and on time execution of work. References can be provided on request.
Cheers!
